nodes.text: Drongar Prime was a star in the Outer Rim Territories. It was approximately the size of Coruscant Prime, but burned hotter, giving Drongar a tropical climate. During the clone wars Drongar was inhabited by both separatists and Republic troops, they were fighting over Bota, a miracle plant. a Jedi healer stationed in one of the rimsoos used some Bota to see the force in completeness and foil a plot to destroy the Republic Rimsoos.
